attributes.action: End second home ownership for MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the public are outraged at the abuse of second home ownership by MPs.
The whole situation could be resolved to the satisfaction of all by the provision of dedicated non profit making accommodation within easy commuting distance of Westminster for MPs, thus removing the need for second homes, and the associated scandalous costs.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
